t:property.name: message.content
t:property.value: Modify draft-add content and recipient from EWS-content

t:property.name: message.subject1
t:property.value: Create draft with subject and content-subject

t:property.name: message.content1
t:property.value: Create draft with subject and content-content

t:test_case.steps: 1. Login to admin account 2. Create a test_account1

t:test_case.t:objective: Create draft with subject in ZWC and sync on EWS. Modify same draft using EWS, add content and recipient and sync to ZWC
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Create draft with subject in ZWC and sync on EWS. 2. Modify same draft using EWS, add content and recipient to it. 3. Sync on ZWC for modified draft.

t:test_case.t:objective: Create draft with subject and content in ZWC and sync on EWS. Modify content of draft using EWS and sync to ZWC
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Create draft with subject, content in ZWC and sync on EWS. 2. Modify same draft using EWS, modify content in it. 3. Sync on ZWC for modified draft.
